method.name: flush_inputs
method.description: Flushes the set actions, you should do this at the start of a frame.

method.name: get_desired_movement_input
method.description: Returns the movement input after modifiers (such as run/walk) are applied.

method.name: get_desired_movement_input_transformed
method.description: Gets the player movement input transformed by [member movement_input_rotation].

method.name: set_input_action_state
method.description: Sets the state of the given digital input action.

method.name: set_movement_input
method.description: Sets the current analog movement input for the agent.

members.member: The path to the node that takes care of visually rotating the character around the Y axis.
The rotation to transform the movement input by, used for camera-aware input `_transformed` methods.
The path to the node that should tilt when accelerating, this should be different from [member graphics_node].

constants.constant: Action that when enabled makes the character's movement switch to run mode from walk mode.
